Reviews.Title: “I'd stay there again!”
Reviews.Author: Michael255093
Reviews.Content: 49 euro night single 39 euro book ahead clean recently upgraded bathrooms comfortable beds friendly helpful englishspeaking staff 10 minutes leisurely stroll kurfurstendamm eateries shopping nearby bad basic little cramped charges wifi 2 euro hour elevators easier stairs despite minor bad budget hotel id happily stay

Reviews.Title: “A hidden treasure for budget travellers!”
Reviews.Author: jmdeg1
Reviews.Content: pleasantly surprised clean stylish hotel accustomed paying twice price half impressive cant recommend value quality hotel stay breakfast else satisfactory huge bathroom

Reviews.Title: “A very good location for a budget priced hotel”
Reviews.Author: Patgriffin
Reviews.Content: hotel situated quiet street minutes walk kurfurstendamm shopping nearest bahn station 100yds reception manned extremely friendly helpful staff chose basic single sufficient sleep clean tidy warm bed comfortable breakfast served modern comfortable cafe range hot cold items available buffet breads jams cold meats cereals yoghurts eggs variety teas plenty excellent coffee value budget priced hotel central location am difficult

Reviews.Title: “very comfy, nice, spacious, quiet, location is fine too”
Reviews.Author: CamacukJ
Reviews.Content: stayed 3 nights comfortable 23 sqm dressing wardrobe bathroom little money possibly breakfast stylish quality super amazing stylish sofa double bed nice house tube station close tube line majorly convenient sightseeing change lines 7 min walk kudamm majorly exciting restaurantsbars quiet friendly id definitely stay

Reviews.Title: “Great for traveller on a budget”
Reviews.Author: philip861
Reviews.Content: stayed metropolitan five nights budget trip berlin hesitate recommend visit located close sbahn station berlins rail system easy reach citys main attractions stayed perfectly functional air conditioning bit 30 degree temperatures walls thin suit light sleepers suited perfectly trip

Reviews.Content: booked hotel choose hotel price stay low location kadewe berlins premier mall ten minute walk hotel ten minutes brings zoologischer garten souvenir shop mcdonalds bakery dunkin donuts ubahn sbahn stations location especially cost hotel bad luck staying heat wave passed berlin third fifth floor neither air conditioning pretty hard family hotel provide fans helped feeling design hotel allow heat escape cooler outside inside design hotel decent hotel converted apartment finding maze lucky hotel middle beginning walks luck service breakfast expensive bet breakfast walk dunkin donuts bakery cleanliness passable found hairs sink shower none mine family beds feel springs mothers actually broke furniture little flimsy table lost legs moved slightly pay parking internet berlin look hotel hear little bit money windows barely shut avoid hotel winter costs

Reviews.Title: “needs non-smoker rooms”
Reviews.Author: stanlund
Reviews.Content: pro hotel quiet neighborhood close subway stations shopping district cleaning stuff trying condition receptionists nice friendly con plus designated nonsmoker – smelly arrival leave windows nearby road contributed noise breakfast variety hardly worth 75 euro sorry elevator fainthearted sagged inch starting movement

Reviews.Title: “we suggest it for his convenience!”
Reviews.Author: CristinaPneum
Reviews.Content: husband lodged metropolitan hotel berlin 2 nights february 2010 hotel located near popular boulevard kurfurstendamm department store kadewe 810 minute foot vicinity wasn’t shop market ubahn 4 minutes foot booked online double floor comfortable double 505 fourth flat nice spacious modern essential furniture bed soft blankets lacks elevator heating radiator evening didn’t staff didn’t breakfast staff little talkative hall lift internet service hall pay hotel solution staying berlin quiet nice hotel price payed 108 euro 2 nights especially suggest convenience
